landing.heroDescription: A life-saving maternal health tracking application designed for rural India. Supporting pregnant women with voice-based guidance, emergency assistance, and personalized AI health monitoring.
landing.challengesDescription: In rural India, maternal healthcare faces significant barriers that put both mothers and babies at risk. Our solution addresses these fundamental challenges.
landing.solutionDescription: We're developing a comprehensive maternal health tracking application that bridges these gaps through voice-based interfaces, multilingual support, offline capabilities, and AI-assisted health monitoring designed specifically for rural communities.
landing.featuresDescription: Designed specifically for rural Indian communities, our platform bridges the gap between expectant mothers and quality healthcare through innovative technology.
landing.footerText: Maternal Health Tracker © {{year}} | Built for rural communities | For queries: care@mama-sahayta.in

lifeThreateningRisks.title: Life-Threatening Risks
lifeThreateningRisks.text: Pregnant women in rural India face severe health risks due to inadequate prenatal care and poor health monitoring systems.

limitedHealthcareAccess.title: Limited Healthcare Access
limitedHealthcareAccess.text: Remote locations with limited connectivity to healthcare providers make timely medical intervention difficult.

knowledgeGap.title: Knowledge Gap
knowledgeGap.text: Many women are illiterate and unaware of proper nutrition, check-up schedules, or warning signs of complications.

inadequateSupportTools.title: Inadequate Support Tools
inadequateSupportTools.text: ASHA workers and family members lack proper tools to effectively guide and monitor maternal health journeys.

voiceBasedDailyLog.title: Voice-Based Daily Log
voiceBasedDailyLog.text: Capture symptoms, fetal movement, and nutrition through guided audio prompts in local languages.

automatedReminders.title: Automated Reminders
automatedReminders.text: IVR/SMS notifications for medication, check-ups, vaccinations, and nutrition schedules.

emergencyLaborButton.title: Emergency Labor Button
emergencyLaborButton.text: One-tap emergency call with GPS location sent to nearest hospital, PHC, or ASHA worker.

ashaWorkerIntegration.title: ASHA Worker Integration
ashaWorkerIntegration.text: Comprehensive dashboard for health workers to track and assist assigned beneficiaries.

familyMemberAccess.title: Family Member Access
familyMemberAccess.text: Allow husbands and family members to receive health reminders and updates on their phones.

multiLanguageSupport.title: Multi-Language Support
multiLanguageSupport.text: Available in Marathi, Hindi, Gujarati, and other regional languages for better accessibility.

aiHealthAssistants.title: AI Health Assistants
aiHealthAssistants.text: Personalized agentic AI provides guidance, symptom monitoring, and emergency escalation support.

ashaQuestionnaire.title: ASHA Worker Registration
ashaQuestionnaire.subtitle: Please provide your professional details
ashaQuestionnaire.welcomeMessage: Welcome {{name}}! Please complete your registration details.
ashaQuestionnaire.defaultWelcome: Welcome ASHA Worker! Please complete your registration details.

documents.label: Upload Documents
documents.description: Upload verification documents (certificates, ID proofs, etc.)

patientQuestionnaire.title: Health Questionnaire
patientQuestionnaire.welcomeMessage: Welcome {{name}}! Please answer a few questions about your health.
patientQuestionnaire.defaultWelcome: Welcome User! Please answer a few questions about your health.

page2.title: Pregnancy Information
page2.subtitle: Help us understand your current situation

monthsAlong.label: How many months along are you?

hasVisitedDoctor.label: Have you visited a doctor or ASHA worker during this pregnancy?

page3.title: Health & Emergency Information
page3.subtitle: Help us understand your health status and emergency preparedness

hasHealthIssues.label: Do you have any known health issues?
hasHealthIssues.description: e.g. diabetes, high blood pressure, anemia

hasRecentSymptoms.label: Have you experienced bleeding, pain, or swelling recently?

takingVitamins.label: Are you currently taking prenatal vitamins or iron supplements?

hasMobileAccess.label: Do you have access to a mobile phone during emergencies?

voiceDailyLog.title: Voice Daily Log
voiceDailyLog.description: Record your daily symptoms and feelings
